name: ''Alhazen''
influences: Aristotle, Euclid, Ptolemy, Galen, Muhammad, Banū Mūsā, Thabit ibn Qurra, al-Kindi, Ibn Sahl, Abū Sahl al-Qūhī
influenced: Omar Khayyám, al-Khazini, Averroes, Roger Bacon, Witelo, John Pecham
known_for: ''Book of Optics'', ''Doubts Concerning Ptolemy'', ''On the Configuration of the World'', ''The Model of the Motions'',  ''Treatise on Light'', ''Treatise on Place'', scientific method, Experiment
